name: Delivery Job
description:
BETA VERSION

Dive in the daily life of a true mailman. Complete challenges under enormous time pressure and several unusual missions to end the day with a satisfying amount of pride, experience and of course some money (Unfortunately only some sort of company currency. So only investments towards the company´s or your colleagues welfare)

Put yourself in one of two important roles in a Delivery Service Company.

Dave is our Deliverydriver. You can always rely on him. Well... most of the time. You see, Dave isn´t the best when it comes to time management. He spends most of the day doing fun stuff like hobbies. Only when he is about to fall asleep, he realizes that he still has to do his work. Event hough he only starts working towards the end of the working day, he somehow always manages to deliver all packages in the shortest possible time, so that he'll finish by the end of his shift.

John is our Package Manager. He is more or less the head of our company. His task is to supervise and plan the packaging process of our company. And when it comes down to it, he also lends a hand. At first John wanted to start out as a driver but his driving skills leave much to be desired, which is why we have given him one of the highest positions in our company (as a kind of substitute). His working place can be reduced down to our warehouse where we store our equipment, packaging machines and canteen supplies. No matter how late it is. No matter what shift has just begun or ended, John is always on hand (which may also explain his sleep deprivation-induced fatigue).
